name: Tale of Milky Cat
description:
Description

You're a milky cat sleeping under the light pore. Some ghosts with their friends wish to play with you.

Have fun and show them your cat punch!

Or you can wake up your tail and try cleaning ghost fire with it!

Control

A/D - Move left/right

Spacebar -Jump

Left click/J - Attack

R - Wake up and separate your tail to help you

Esc - Pause game

Enjoy~
